contents.text: Thank you for calling Kiip, the San Francisco-based in-app mobile advertising platform connecting brands to customers at meaningful moments.
If you are interested in new advertising partnerships, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our partnerships team. Your call is important to us.

navigationGoals: Discuss an in-app advertising partnership for our upcoming product launch.
As a veteran entrepreneur, I want to discuss a new advertising partnership.
I want to explore setting up a new in-app ad partnership using your SDK.
I’d like to speak with someone about starting a new advertising partnership with Kiip.
I’d like to set up a new in-app advertising partnership to promote my physics research app.

contents.text: If you have questions about your current campaign or billing, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our billing and campaign support team. One moment please.

navigationGoals: Resolve a billing discrepancy on my current campaign invoice.
I need to review the billing details for my current Kiip campaign.
I need to clarify some billing line items on my active campaign invoice.
I need help understanding the billing charges on my current ad campaign.
I need to review the billing details and performance metrics of my current ad campaign.

contents.text: For technical support and account services, press 2.
For technical assistance with the Kiip platform, press 1.
Please hold while we route you to technical support. Our team will be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot the API integration error on my Kiip account.
I’m troubleshooting technical issues with the Kiip SDK integration.
I’m troubleshooting an API integration error with the Kiip platform.
I’m having trouble logging into my Kiip advertiser account and need technical support.
I’m experiencing integration issues with the Kiip SDK in my physics quiz app and need technical support.

contents.text: For account management and user settings, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to the account services team. One moment please.

navigationGoals: Update team access permissions and contact info in my account.
I want to update my account settings, such as my payment method and contact info.
I need to update my developer account permissions and user settings.
I’d like to update my account settings, such as my contact email and payment information.
I want to update my account email to my university address and adjust my notification preferences.
